startMsg:
alright! I'm here to help you decide best hairstyle for you.
If incase you want to restart, just say 'restart' or 'start over'.

Great! Let's help you decide your style.
If incase you want to restart, just say 'restart' or 'start over'.

Good to hear from you! I'm your personal hair-styler.
If incase you want to restart, just say 'restart' or 'start over'.
selFaceType: Let's start with your face type first.
Lets look at your Face Type first. Shall we?
First I would like to know your face type.
We will start with your face type first!
selHairLength: Alright! Moving on to your hair length. How long do you want your hairs to be?
Great! Now how long do you want your hairs to be?
Perfect! Now may I know how long hair do you want?
Nice! What's your favoured hair length?.
selHairStyle: Perfect! Now what kind of hair style do you prefer?
Nice, What kind of hair style would you like?
Nice choice there, Now may I ask what hair style do you prefer?
Great! Now which hair style do you like the most?
selHairBang: Nice choice! What kind of hair bang do you prefer?
Perfect! May I know which hair bang would you prefer?
Nice! Now which hair bang among these is best for you?
Alright! Now what kind of hair bang would you like to have?
selHairLayer: Appreciate it! Atlast I would like to know your likeable hair layer.
Alright! At the end, May I know which hair layer do you prefer?
Perfect! Lastly, I would like to know your hair layer.
Almost finished! Which kind of hair layer would you like to have?
praising: You have made a great decision!
goodbye: I hope you've enjoyed my service.
I hope to see you again, soon.
I'd love to welcome you back at some time.
Thank you for using my service.
help: -- weight and price of the pizza
reviews: - "I didn't like it. Lady at the checkout was rude."
- "I loved pop band that performed there the other day <3"
- "Best cafe to go to after long and tiring day."
order: Would you like to order pizza?
Do you want to order pizza?
Ready to make a pizza order?
Do you want to have a look at our pizza list?
Would you like to see our menu?
Maybe you want to order some pizza?
noQ: How can I help you then?
What questions do you have then?
What do you want to ask then?
Oh! You have a question then.
Okay, probably you already know the menu.
fallback: Sorry, I don't understand what you meant by
My apologies, I don't understand your request
I was not programmed to answer this request
I'm sorry, I don't know how to answer on your reply
Something went wrong, I don't have any suitable replies for

resultOne: You've ordered [size] [type] pizza on [crust] crust with [sauce] sauce.
Your order is: [size] [type] pizza on [crust] dough. And some [sauce] sauce.
oneMore: Do you still want to add one more pizza?
Are you still NOT ready to submit?
If you finished with your order type "NO"
Do you want to order more?
Anything to add to your order? Yes or no?
Do you want to add something else to your order?
Do you want to modify your order more? Yes or no?
Type "NO" if you are ready to submit
notDoneYet: Okay. What else do you want to order?
What do you want to add?
One more pizza? What would you like to add?
order_number: You have submitted your order! Your tracking number is [order_number].
Congrats! You have successfully submitted your order. Here is your tracking number: [order_number].
Your order was submitted successfully. You are able to track your order using this number [order_number]

grab_meal: Would you like to pickup order by yourself or order a delivery?
Do you prefer delivery or pickup?
Do you want to pickup your order or you prefer delivery?
Are you choosing delivery or pickup?
Are you planning to order delivery or pickup your pizza yourself?
Choose one of the option: delivery or pickup.
What is more comfortable for you delivery or pickup?
Tell me what are you choosing: pickup or delivery?
user_address_q: What address do you want to order it to?
Where do you live? Please provide your address.
user_address_answ: The order will be at your place in [min] minutes.
Your order will be ready in [min] minutes. Our courier will contact you.
Order will be ready approximately in [min] min. You can check your order in our app. In case of any problems contact our service team.
our_address: We are waiting for you at "[restaurant_location]" in [min] minutes.
Your order will be ready in [min] minutes. Please come to this address "[restaurant_location]"
You will find your order at "[restaurant_location]" in [min] minutes.

error: Please add pizza type and pizza size to know the price. If you want to see all prices type "menu".
You request must include type and size of pizza to get its price.
You can type "menu" to see all prices. Otherwise, your question must include pizza type and size.
Make sure pizza type and pizza size are mentioned.

botQuestion: What kind of pizza would you like?
What exactly would you like?
What are you choosing?
Have you made a decision? I'm ready to write down.
Are sticking to classic: margarita or four cheeses? Or something else?
What type of pizza do you want to order?
What are you ordering?
Have you chosen something already?
What type of pizza do you stick to?
What size?
What size would you prefer: large, standard or small?
What about the size: large, standard, small?
Large, standard or small. Pick the size please.
Large, standard or small?
botAnswer: For size we have 3 options: large, standard or small.
We have large, standard and small pizza sizes.
Our pizzeria suggests three sizes: small, standard and large.

botQuestion: What dip sauce would you like to choose?
What dip sauce you want to get on the side?
What about the dip sauce? Ketchup, ranch, BBQ sauce or ..?
Pick the dip sauce now.
Please pick the dip sauce.
Do you want cheese sauce or ketchup on the side? Or something else?
botAnswer: For sauces we have several options: [sauce_list].
We have [sauce_list] dip sauces for our pizzas.
Have a look at our sauce list: [sauce_list].

botQuestion: What about the pizza crust? Thin or thick?
Thin or thick crust?
Pick the crust now please
Do you prefer your pizza on thick or thin crust?
On which crust do you want your pizza? Thick, thin?
Thick crust pizza or thin crust pizza?
Would you like it on thin or thick crust?
botAnswer: For crust we have 2 options: thick and thin.
We make pizza on thick and thin crusts.
Our pizzeria suggests two variants: thick or thin.
We have thick and thin dough.
